article:
Chinese are very generous   when it comes to educating their children. Not   caring about  the money, parents often send their
children to the best schools or even abroad. They also want their children to
take extra-course  _  through which they will learn
either an instrument or ballet  , or other classes which will give them a head start in life.
Chinese believe that the   more expensive  an education is, the better it is. So
parents would like to spend a large amount of money on education. Even  _  couples will buy a computer for their son or daughter. However, what
most parents  _  to see is that the best early
education they can give their children is usually very cheap. Parents can see
that their children's skills vary, skilled in some areas while poor in others.  _  most parents fail to realize is that today's children lack
self-respect and self-confidence.ks5u
The problem is that parents are only   _  their children by teaching
them how to take multiple-choice tests and how to study well, but parents are
not teaching them the most important skills they need to be  _  ,
happy and clever. Parents can achieve this by teaching  _  skills
like cooking, sewing and doing other housework.  _  a
child to cook will improve many of the skills that he will need later in life.
